channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: Freshly Baked NYC Debuts Legal Weed Delivery in Long Island City, Manhattan, Queens and Brooklyn.
item.source:markdown: Freshly Baked NYC Debuts Legal Weed Delivery in Long Island City, Manhattan, Queens and Brooklyn.

item.description: These are the podcasts I follow in FeedLand. I want more in this list. But not too many.
item.source:markdown: These are the podcasts I follow in FeedLand. I want more in this list. But not too many.

item.description: A university president who blogs.
item.source:markdown: A university president who blogs.

item.description: CJ Rossitano on Winning the SNL Ticket Lottery.
item.source:markdown: CJ Rossitano on Winning the SNL Ticket Lottery.

item.description: 2014: Interop means that I can give you a text file, and you will have a program that can open it. Interop means you can pull into any gas station and put fuel in your car. Interop means you can give me $100 and I'll give you my Knicks ticket, and when you go to the arena, they will let you in.
item.source:markdown: 2014: Interop means that I can give you a text file, and you will have a program that can open it. Interop means you can pull into any gas station and put fuel in your car. Interop means you can give me $100 and I'll give you my Knicks ticket, and when you go to the arena, they will let you in.

item.description: Stop Wearing Vision Pro Goggles While Driving Your Tesla, U.S. Says.

item.description: Andrew Hickey says Spotify and podcasts don't mix well. I totally agree.

item.description: We used to listen to Saturday Night Fever when I was in Madison in the mid 70s. Listening to the music now, so many years later, I can relive the wonderful feelings of those days.
item.source:markdown: We used to listen to Saturday Night Fever when I was in Madison in the mid 70s. Listening to the music now, so many years later, I can relive the wonderful feelings of those days.

item.description: I like it when developers are straight about their motivations and responsibilities. I try to do the same.
item.source:markdown: I like it when developers are straight about their motivations and responsibilities. I try to do the same.

item.description: I’ve actually been enjoying Nets games now that they’re over the “win now” philosophy. Last nights game with the Warriors was excellent.
item.source:markdown: I’ve actually been enjoying Nets games now that they’re over the “win now” philosophy. Last nights game with the Warriors was excellent.

item.description: Just thought of a place in San Jose I used to like, apparently closed in 2017.
item.source:markdown: Just thought of a place in San Jose I used to like, apparently closed in 2017.

item.description: Goofy 'God's Army' convoy on Texas border shows Trump's MAGA movement is just one long con.
item.source:markdown: Goofy 'God's Army' convoy on Texas border shows Trump's MAGA movement is just one long con.

item.description: What's really in Biden's bipartisan immigration deal.
item.source:markdown: What's really in Biden's bipartisan immigration deal.

item.description: I'm reading Liz Cheney's book, and forgot something I had guessed during the insurrection. Trump was calling Congresspeople saying if you stop the count I'll call off the attack. In other words, your life for a vote. I suspected it before, but they have testimony that confirms it.
item.source:markdown: I'm reading Liz Cheney's book, and forgot something I had guessed during the insurrection. Trump was calling Congresspeople saying if you stop the count I'll call off the attack. In other words, your life for a vote. I suspected it before, but they have testimony that confirms it.

item.description: New York Knicks Voices Mike Breen, Walt Frazier Celebrate 25 Years on MSG Network.
item.source:markdown: New York Knicks Voices Mike Breen, Walt Frazier Celebrate 25 Years on MSG Network.

item.description: Thinking of buying an Apple Vision Pro, but when I went to the site, my iPhone 13 Pro wouldn't do anything when I clicked on the first image. Oh well. Not like any of this stuff works, right.
item.source:markdown: Thinking of buying an Apple Vision Pro, but when I went to the site, my iPhone 13 Pro wouldn't do anything when I clicked on the first image. Oh well. Not like any of this stuff works, right.

item.description: Keith Teare with a real benefit for the new Apple goggles: "No need for a standing desk or an office for that matter. The $3500 is cheaper than they would cost. Those living in smaller spaces and working from home should love it."
item.source:markdown: Keith Teare with a real benefit for the new Apple goggles: "No need for a standing desk or an office for that matter. The $3500 is cheaper than they would cost. Those living in smaller spaces and working from home should love it."

item.description: Apple Gave Us No Good Reason to Buy the Vision Pro.
item.source:markdown: Apple Gave Us No Good Reason to Buy the Vision Pro.

item.description: How Donald Trump reduced the GOP to groveling sycophants.
item.source:markdown: How Donald Trump reduced the GOP to groveling sycophants.

item.description: “A public park with a small marketplace on one side is surrounded by a courthouse, a playing field, businesses, and a radio station. In the marketplace wander male and female reporters, some taking notes, some with cameras.”
item.source:markdown: “A public park with a small marketplace on one side is surrounded by a courthouse, a playing field, businesses, and a radio station. In the marketplace wander male and female reporters, some taking notes, some with cameras.”

item.description: I'm reading about discussion in Congress regarding exempting newspaper publishers from antitrust so they can address the threat of new technology. "Our chief interest is to keep newspapers alive," says the legislator. The date: 1963. The technology: television.
item.source:markdown: I'm reading about discussion in Congress regarding exempting newspaper publishers from antitrust so they can address the threat of new technology. "Our chief interest is to keep newspapers alive," says the legislator. The date: 1963\. The technology: television.

item.description: A Node package that reads RSS, Atom and RDF feeds and calls back with a simple, consistent JavaScript object.
item.source:markdown: A Node package that reads RSS, Atom and RDF feeds and calls back with a simple, consistent JavaScript object.

item.source:markdown: GPT getting stuck with multi-step instructions.

item.description: I would much prefer if Apple had poured their vast resources and creativity into making mass transport work in the Bay Area instead, as a prototype for what might be possible in the rest of the world.
item.source:markdown: I would much prefer if Apple had poured their vast resources and creativity into making mass transport work in the Bay Area instead, as a prototype for what might be possible in the rest of the world.

item.description: Siskel & Ebert review The Big Lebowski. That's just like, your opinion, man.
item.source:markdown: Siskel & Ebert review The Big Lebowski. That's just like, your opinion, man.

item.description: I asked ChatGPT to design a full-featured feed reader using MySQL, and it got it right. Transcript attached. Remarkable. I wonder what else it could do. I have an idea of using it, eventually, with some work, to port software from Mac to Linux.
item.source:markdown: I asked ChatGPT to design a full-featured feed reader using MySQL, and it got it right. Transcript attached. Remarkable. I wonder what else it could do. I have an idea of using it, eventually, with some work, to port software from Mac to Linux.

item.description: Why Quora isn’t useful anymore: A.I. came for the best site on the internet.
item.source:markdown: Why Quora isn’t useful anymore: A.I. came for the best site on the internet.

item.description: This is how AI meets feed readers. Brilliant positioning.

item.description: People who get my blog via nightly email, there are new requirements from Google and Yahoo, and I have no freaking idea wtf they're talking about. If you have an idea, tell me what I have to do. Thanks.
item.source:markdown: People who get my blog via nightly email, there are new requirements from Google and Yahoo, and I have no freaking idea wtf they're talking about. If you have an idea, tell me what I have to do. Thanks.

item.description: I need more podcasts for my FeedLand category. Send me your best links.

item.description: Wouldn't it be great if sites were rated on how good their archive is, so you'd know to point to them for future-safety of your link.
